com.guardtime.envelope.document

Class SignedDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.envelope.document.SignedDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Document, EnvelopeElement, AutoCloseable

    public class SignedDocument
extends Object
implements Document
    Wrapper for a Document which creates a backward link to the SignatureContent that contains the Document and that provides the EnvelopeSignature for the document. Helper class to allow for simpler association between a Document and EnvelopeSignature and any related Annotations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SignedDocument(Document original, SignatureContent content)
      Creates Document wrapper from provided original Document and provided SignatureContent.
